page.title: 03The New School, Henham 1
page.content: The new school was opened in 1975,and the nursery was opened in January 1976 There were 8 teachers then and 150 pupils in 1976.Mr Griffiths was pleased to become the headteacher.The old school was too small for all the children so the new school was built. In the new school the teachers only use corparal punishment for very,very bad behaviour.The new school had a field and a playground.A nature area was started in 1981.On the playground for the children to sit in there is a bus shelter.The flower beds are going to be an extention of the school play ground. In 1985 there are 197 pupils in the school.The school has an emblem of a dragon.We have a flag which has the emblem and underneath it has the school name.The school is divided into 4 teams venus yellow saturn green jupiter blue Mars red .
